/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Cars and buses are seen in motion on the road, indicating the city's active life. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, enhancing the colors and casting shadows that add depth to the scene.
